thread.title: Google launches its Android Developer Nanodegree program in India
thread.title_full: Google launches its Android Developer Nanodegree program in India - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Google launches its Android Developer Nanodegree program in India
text: In May, we told you that Google had partnered with Udacity to offer a new Android Developer Nanodegree program. Now, Google has announced that it is launching the same program in India. With a vision to transform India into a hub of high-quality mobile developers for global and local apps, we’re delighted to announce the […] »
